entries.hit_target_12: Approaching entity: this unit's databank shows you as unwelcome.
entries.hit_target_11: This unit is causing leakage in the targeted entity.
entries.hit_target_8: ended unexpectedly but has been recovered. SIG_TARGET_ALIVE received.
entries.hit_target_7: DEBUG:: (comment: // droid is in combat and has damaged an opponent. Run taunt routines.)
entries.hit_target_6: WARNING:: failed to parse taunt table. Central memory core dump in progress.
entries.hit_target_5: Query: does aggressor entity require repairs?
entries.hit_target_4: Statement: Entity, you are damaged. You should withdraw and be repaired.
entries.hit_target_3: Under attack. Under attack. Remove power core from attacker!
entries.ally_16: Friendly entity targeted by hostile entity.
entries.ally_14: Enemy entity engaging in hostile activity. Terminate.
entries.ally_12: Warning: you are executing aggressive actions against a friendly entity.
entries.ally_9: Attacked target: you appear in need of assistance.
entries.ally_8: Attacked entity: are you in need of assistance?
entries.ally_6: Aggressive entity: you are in violation of protocols in my databank.
entries.ally_4: Aggressive entity: desist or be terminated.
entries.ally_2: Warning: tactical error executed. Do not attack friendly entities.
entries.help_16: Unit could use some help here...
entries.help_12: Unit is at risk of dismantling.
entries.help_10: Memory core note: current aggressor highly dangerous.
entries.help_8: Friendly entities, please gather around me!
entries.help_4: Preparing core memory dump in event of termination.
entries.help_3: Sensors indicate major threat to unit's survival.
entries.attacked_12: Target: recommend activating your flee procedure.
entries.attacked_11: Preparing core memory dump in event of termination.
entries.attacked_9: Under attack. Under attack. Remove power core from attacker!
entries.attacked_8: Dismantle entity. Dispose of scrap metal.
entries.attacked_5: ERROR! ERROR! Do not attack self!
entries.attacked_2: WARNING: this droid is now highly dangerous. Bystanders are advised to step away. Please have a nice day.
entries.hit_16: DEBUG:: external shock to system causing memory core loss.
entries.hit_15: FATAL:: overheating core. Reducing clock speed.
entries.hit_14: WARNING: damage verified on motivator unit assembly.
entries.hit_13: WARNING: damage verified on cooling unit.
entries.hit_12: WARNING: attempted damage to memory core.
entries.hit_11: WARNING: attempted damage to processor core.
entries.hit_9: The system core has recovered from a crashed thread.
entries.hit_7: Attempted dismantling of this unit failed.
entries.hit_6: WARNING! WARNING! Hostile entities attempting to dismantle this unit!
entries.hit_4: This unit is now in need of repair.
entries.hit_3: This unit is suffering damage. Please repair.
entries.hit_2: Sensors identify a hostile entity causing damage to this unit.
entries.hit_1: Exterior chassis sensors note a new dent.
entries.gloat_11: Analysis of enemy shows a lack of useful self-repair material.
entries.gloat_7: Combat target appears to have suffered a FATAL.
entries.gloat_6: Target has suffered a power failure.
entries.gloat_5: Target appears to be forcibly rebooting.
entries.gloat_2: DEBUG:: Popping target off of stack.
entries.gloat_1: Executing gloat procedures. Selecting random message. Random message not found.
entries.death_14: The system is shutting down now.
entries.death_13: FATAL:: Irretrievable error in central operation system. Rebooting...
entries.death_9: Dumping core. Storage capacity full! Memory corruption may result.
entries.death_6: System has suffered an irrecoverable error. Backing up core... read/write error, BACKUP FAILED.
entries.death_5: An error has occurred in module 0x00BE652.
entries.death_3: Random access memory has been scrambled.
entries.death_2: Sensor display indicates bright white tunnel.
entries.death_1: FATAL:: possible corruption in central processing core.
entries.threat_16: Combat subroutines now active. Target acquired. TARGET: you are marked for attack.
entries.threat_12: Intruder alert! Withdraw or I will forcibly shut you down.
entries.threat_11: Intruder alert! Withdraw or I will remove your power core.
entries.threat_10: Intruder alert! Withdraw or be dismantled.
entries.threat_8: Sensors indicate a hostile is in the vicinity. Preparing to terminate.
entries.threat_5: Approaching entity: This is a threat.
entries.threat_4: Approaching entity: this unit's databank shows you as potentially hostile. Withdraw.
entries.threat_1: Intruder alert! Withdraw or be terminated.
entries.bye_mean_13: Datacore storage process running. Recording disliked entity.
entries.bye_mean_12: Calculating time elapsed in proximity to disliked entity.
entries.bye_mean_5: Registering welcome departure from sensor radius.
entries.bye_mid_16: Attempt to store entity in memory core failed. Commencing memory dump.
entries.bye_mid_13: Memory datacore storage adding departing individual.
entries.bye_mid_6: Query: if entity departs, will entity continue to exist?
entries.bye_mid_4: Deactivating close observation mode on optic sensors.
entries.bye_mid_3: Optic sensors detect withdrawal of entity.
entries.bye_nice_14: Optic sensors do not wish to cease tracking entity.
entries.bye_nice_13: Click, click click. Buzz. Whirr. Whirr. Goodbye.
entries.bye_nice_11: Expressing regret. Entity departing soothes circuits.
entries.bye_nice_10: Deprioritizing thread associated with departing entity.
entries.bye_nice_8: Storing entity in memory core... complete.
entries.bye_nice_7: Warning: memory datacore in danger of overflow.
entries.bye_nice_3: Calculating time elapsed in proximity to liked entity.
entries.hi_mean_15: Entity: you are not welcome here.
entries.hi_mean_11: Alert! Approaching entity is possible hostile.
entries.hi_mean_10: Approaching entity: withdraw or face consequences!
entries.hi_mean_9: Alert: Memory core shows approaching entity is flagged as disliked.
entries.hi_mean_8: Approaching entity: remove yourself from my sensor radius.
entries.hi_mean_6: Approaching entity: Recommend translation along any axis away from immediate region.
entries.hi_mean_3: Memory core note: approaching entity is distasteful.
entries.hi_mean_2: DEBUG:: (comment: // droid hates the person coming close, run rejection routines.)
entries.hi_mean_1: Approaching entity: this unit's databank shows you as unwelcome.
entries.hi_mid_14: DEBUG:: (comment // droid does not recognize the person coming close, run standard greeting routines.)
entries.hi_mid_13: Alert: memory core shows approaching entity is not flagged.
entries.hi_mid_12: Memory core note: approaching entity not found.
entries.hi_mid_10: Query: what does approaching entity want?
entries.hi_mid_9: Query: are you looking for someone?
entries.hi_mid_8: Query: are you looking for something?
entries.hi_mid_4: Prioritizing thread associated with approaching entity.
entries.hi_mid_3: Executing greet procedures. Selecting random message. Random message not found.
entries.hi_nice_15: Alert: memory core shows approaching entity is flagged as friendly.
entries.hi_nice_13: Friendly entity being tracked by sensors.
entries.hi_nice_12: Greeting subroutines now active, with cheerful modifiers.
entries.hi_nice_11: Process load decreasing in presence of friendly entity.
entries.hi_nice_9: WARNING:: failed to parse greeting table. Central memory core dump in progress.
entries.hi_nice_8: Approaching entity: this unit's databank shows you as welcome.
entries.hi_nice_5: Approaching entity: permission granted to enter sensor radius.
entries.hi_nice_3: Prioritizing thread associated with approaching entity.
entries.hi_nice_1: Executing greet procedures (cheerful modifiers). Selecting random message. Random message not found.
entries.flee_15: Query: is enemy entity catching up?
entries.flee_14: Memory core note: current aggressor highly dangerous.
entries.flee_8: Please advise: forcible unit shutdown imminent.
entries.flee_6: Unit is in danger of dismantling.
entries.calm_13: FATAL:: alert target lost. Aborting STATE_ALERT.
entries.calm_12: DEBUG:: transition from STATE_ALERT to STATE_CALM complete.
entries.calm_11: Alert state ratcheting down. New baseline is now Calm status.
entries.calm_9: Scan of area complete. No threats detected.
entries.calm_6: Returning to defragmenting the memory core.
entries.alert_8: Proximity alert activated. Please take appropriate action.
entries.calm_4: Assessment of threat indicates no danger.
entries.calm_3: FATAL:: Intruder alert module has crashed.
entries.flee_3: Danger: central processing core at risk of overheating.
